strapiPost.title: Only In Arkansas Features NWA Co-working Spaces
strapiPost.content:
Working from home has made its way into the “new normal” of our lives. For many, the “home” they work from is a co-working space, which has become a great alternative to an office. 

  • WFH away from home: Only in Arkansas recently published a detailed list of Arkansas co-working spaces highlighting Northwest Arkansas’s fair share of official locations. Though coffee shops and the public library are not bad places to call home for the workday, an official work environment does prove productive.
  • To name a few: In Fayetteville, there is CenterSpace and Likewise. Rogers has Punktuary, loloft, and The Cofounder. Bentonville features Regus, Cast Coworkspace, and soon-to-open Ledger. NWA Workplaces has a location in Bentonville and Bella Vista. 

Click HERE for more info.
